title: The Favorites - NFL Week 14 Gambling Preview
itunes:title: The Favorites - NFL Week 14 Gambling Preview
description:
The public did well last week as a number of popular sides cashing, despite the Detroit Lions actually winning a football game! Action Network Chief Content Officer Chad Millman welcomes back his BFF Simon Hunter, professional NFL bettor, to discuss the entire upcoming slate from top to bottom, including potential plays on the New York Giants, Washington Football Team and Los Angeles Rams. As their producer, Buffalo Bills fan Matt Mitchell, weeps pathetically into a carton of leftover wings, Simon and Chad discuss every game on the board, along with their top picks to bet right away.

MIN PIT - 9 MIN

BAL CLE - 11 MIN

KC LV - 14 MIN

WFT DAL - 18 MIN

NO NYJ - 22 MIN

JAX TENN - 25 MIN

SEA HOU - 27 MIN

DET DEN - 32 MIN

NYG LAC - 34 MIN

SF CIN - 36 MIN

TB BUF - 39 MIN

CHI GB - 42 MIN

LAR AZ - 44 MIN

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
